   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   26: 	 binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1,
   27: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,
   28:          unicode_prompt/1, shell_slogan/1, raw_stdout/1, raw_stdout_isatty/1,
   29:          file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1, file_read_stdin_list_mode/1,
   30:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   31:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   32:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   33:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   34:          io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode/1,
   35:          io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_until_stdin_list_mode/1,
   36:          io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1,
   37:          file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode/1,
   38:          file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode/1,
   39:          io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode/1
   40:         ]).
   41: 
   42: 
   43: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   44: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   45: %% For spawn
   46: -export([answering_machine1/3, answering_machine2/3]).
   47: 
   48: -export([uprompt/1, slogan/0, session_slogan/0]).
   49: 
   50: -export([write_raw_to_stdout/0, read_raw_from_stdin/1]).
   51: 
   52: -export([get_until_eof/2]).
   53: 
   54: %%-define(debug, true).
   55: 
   56: -ifdef(debug).
   57: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   58: -else.
   59: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   60: -endif.
   61: 
   62: suite() ->
   63:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   64:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   65: 
   66: all() -> 
   67:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   68:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl,
   69:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt,
   70:      shell_slogan, raw_stdout, raw_stdout_isatty,
   71:      file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   72:      file_read_stdin_list_mode,
   73:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   74:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   75:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   76:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   77:      io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode,
   78:      io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode,
   79:      io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode,
   80:      io_get_until_stdin_list_mode,
   81:      io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   82:      file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode,
   83:      file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode,
   84:      io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode
   85:     ].
   86: 
   87: groups() -> 
   88:     [].
   89: 
   90: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   91:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   92:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   93:     DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
   94:     [{default_shell,DefShell},{term, Term}|Config].
   95: 
   96: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   97:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
   98:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: -record(state, {
  108:                 q = [],
  109:                 nxt = eof,
  110:                 mode = list
  111:                }).
  112: 
  113: uprompt(_L) ->
  114:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  115: 
  116: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  117: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  119:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  120: 	new ->
  121: 	    rtnode:run(
  122:               [{putline,""},
  123:                {putline, "2."},
  124:                {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  125:                {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  126:                {expect, "[\n ]default"},
  127:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  128:                {putline, "hej"},
  129:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  130:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  131:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  132:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  133:                {putline, "hej"},
  134:                {expect,"[\n ]hej"},
  135:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  136:               ],[],"",["-pa",PA]);
  137:         _ ->
  138:             ok
  139:     end,
  140:     %% And one with oldshell
  141:     rtnode:run(
  142:       [{putline,""},
  143:        {putline, "2."},
  144:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  145:        {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  146:        {expect, "default"},
  147:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  148:        {putline, "hej"},
  149:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  150:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  151:        {expect, "[\n ]\\?*ok"},
  152:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  153:        {putline, "hej"},
  154:        {expect,"[\n ]\\?*hej"},
  155:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  156:       ],[],"",["-oldshell","-pa",PA]),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  160: shell_slogan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  162:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  163: 	new ->
  164: 	    rtnode:run(
  165:               [{expect, "\\Q"++string:trim(erlang:system_info(system_version))++"\\E"},
  166:                {expect, "\\Q"++io_lib:format("Eshell V~s (press Ctrl+G to abort, type help(). for help)",[erlang:system_info(version)])++"\\E"}
  167:               ],[],"",[]),
  168:       	    rtnode:run(
  169:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  170:                {expect, "\nTest session slogan \\("}
  171:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","\"Test slogan\"",
  172:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","\"Test session slogan\""]),
  173:       	    rtnode:run(
  174:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  175:                {expect, "\\Q\nTest session slogan (\\E"}
  176:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:slogan/0",
  177:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:session_slogan/0",
  178:                        "-pa",PA]);
  179:         _ ->
  180:             ok
  181:     end.
  182: 
  183: slogan() ->
  184:     "Test slogan".
  185: session_slogan() ->
  186:     "Test session slogan".
  187: 
  188: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  189: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  190:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  191: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  192:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  193:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  194:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  195:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  196:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  197:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  198:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  199:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  200:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  201:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  202:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  203:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  204:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  205:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  206:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  207:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  208:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  209:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  210:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  211:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  212:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  213:     file:close(WFile),
  214:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  215:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  216:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  217:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  218:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  219:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  220:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  221:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  222:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  223: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  224:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  225:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  226:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  227: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  228:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  229:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  230:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  231: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  232:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  233:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  234:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  235: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  236:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  237:     file:position(RFile,0),
  238:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  239:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  240:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  241:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  242:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  243:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  244:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  245:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  246:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  247: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  248:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  249:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  250:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  251: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  252:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  253:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  254:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  255: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  256:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  257:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  258:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  259: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  260:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  261:     file:close(RFile),
  262:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  263: 	new ->
  264: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  265: 	    rtnode:run(
  266:               [{putline,""},
  267:                {putline, "2."},
  268:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  269:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  270:                {expect, "{binary,false}"},
  271:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  272:                {putline, "hej"},
  273:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  274:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  275:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  276:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  277:                {putline, "hej"},
  278:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  279:               ],[]);
  280:         _ ->
  281:             ok
  282:     end,
  283:     %% And one with oldshell
  284:     rtnode:run(
  285:       [{putline,""},
  286:        {putline, "2."},
  287:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  288:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  289:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  290:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  291:        {putline, "hej"},
  292:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  293:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  294:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  295:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  296:        {putline, "hej"},
  297:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  298:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  302: file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  303:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  304: 
  305:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  306:     {ok, "got: <<\"abc\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  307:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  308:     {ok, "got: <<\"def\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  309:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  310:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  311: 
  312:     ok.
  313: 
  314: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  315: file_read_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  316:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  317: 
  318:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  319:     {ok, "got: \"abc\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  320:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  321:     {ok, "got: \"def\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  322:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  323:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  324: 
  325:     ok.
  326: 
  327: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  328: %% correct error when in binary mode
  329: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  330:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  331: 
  332:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  333:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  334:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  335:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  336: 
  337:     ok.
  338: 
  339: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  340: %% correct error when in list mode
  341: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  342:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  343: 
  344:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  345:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  346:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  347:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  348: 
  349:     ok.
  350: 
  351: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  352: %% correct error when in binary mode
  353: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  354:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [binary]),
  355: 
  356:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  357:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  358:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  359:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  360: 
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  364: %% correct error when in list mode
  365: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  366:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [list]),
  367: 
  368:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  369:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  370:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  371:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  372: 
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in binary mode
  376: io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  377:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  378:                          fun() ->
  379:                                  case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  380:                                      eof -> eof;
  381:                                      Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  382:                                  end
  383:                          end, [binary]),
  384: 
  385:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  386:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  387:     {ok, "got: <<\"\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  388:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  389:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  390: 
  391:     ok.
  392: 
  393: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in binary mode
  394: io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  395: 
  396:     GetUntilEof =
  397:         fun() ->
  398:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  399:                 IoServer !
  400:                     {io_request,
  401:                      self(),
  402:                      IoServer,
  403:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  404:                 receive
  405:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  406:                         {ok, Data}
  407:                 end
  408:         end,
  409: 
  410:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  411: 
  412:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  413:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  414:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  415:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  416: 
  417:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  418: 
  419:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  420:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  421:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  422: 
  423:     ok.
  424: 
  425: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in list mode
  426: io_get_until_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  427: 
  428:     GetUntilEof =
  429:         fun() ->
  430:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  431:                 IoServer !
  432:                     {io_request,
  433:                      self(),
  434:                      IoServer,
  435:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  436:                 receive
  437:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  438:                         {ok, Data}
  439:                 end
  440:         end,
  441: 
  442:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  443: 
  444:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  445:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  446:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  447:     {ok, "got: \"x\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  448: 
  449:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  450: 
  451:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  452:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  453:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  454: 
  455:     ok.
  456: 
  457: get_until_eof([],eof) -> {done,eof,[]};
  458: get_until_eof(ThisFar,eof) -> {done,ThisFar,eof};
  459: get_until_eof(ThisFar,CharList) -> {more,ThisFar++CharList}.
  460: 
  461: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in list mode
  462: io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  463:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  464:                          fun() -> case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  465:                                       eof -> eof;
  466:                                       Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  467:                                   end
  468:                          end, [list]),
  469: 
  470:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  471:     {ok, "got: \"x\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  472:     {ok, "got: \"\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  473:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  474:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  475: 
  476:     ok.
  477: 
  478: %% Test that mixing io:get_chars and file:read works when stdin is in binary mode.
  479: io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  480:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  481:                          fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 1) of
  482:                                       eof -> eof;
  483:                                       {ok, Chars} ->
  484:                                           case io:get_line(standard_io, "") of
  485:                                               eof -> Chars;
  486:                                               Line ->
  487:                                                   {ok, [Chars, Line]}
  488:                                           end
  489:                                   end
  490:                          end, [binary]),
  491: 
  492:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "1\n"),
  493:     {ok, "got: [<<\"1\">>,<<\"\\n\">>]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  494:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  495:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  496: 
  497:     ok.
  498: 
  499: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  500: file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  501:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  502:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  503:                          [binary],
  504:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  505: 
  506:     %% Invalid utf8
  507:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  508: 
  509:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  510:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  511:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  512:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  513:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  514: 
  515:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  516:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  517:                          [binary],
  518:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  519: 
  520:     %% Valid utf8
  521:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  522: 
  523:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  524:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  525:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  526:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  527:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  528: 
  529:     %% Setting using io:setopts used to hang on Windows, see #7459 for details.
  530:     {ok, P3, ErlPort3} = start_stdin_node(
  531:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  532:                          [binary],
  533:                          "-eval \"io:setopts([{encoding, latin1}])\""),
  534: 
  535:     %% Invalid utf8
  536:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort3, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  537: 
  538:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  539:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  540:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  541:     ErlPort3 ! {self(), close},
  542:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  543: 
  544:     ok.
  545: 
  546: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  547: file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode(_Config) ->
  548:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  549:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  550:                          [list],
  551:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  552: 
  553:     %% Invalid utf8
  554:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  555: 
  556:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  557:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  558:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  559:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  560:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  561: 
  562:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  563:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  564:                          [list],
  565:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  566: 
  567:     %% Valid utf8
  568:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  569: 
  570:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  571:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  572:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  573:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  574:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  575: 
  576:     ok.
  577: 
  578: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is not utf8,
  579: %% but unicode is printed out
  580: io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode(_Config) ->
  581:     {ok, P, ErlPort} =
  582:         start_stdin_node(
  583:           fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 5) of
  584:                        {ok, Chars} ->
  585:                            %% We've read a unicode string as latin1,
  586:                            %% which means that if we convert it to
  587:                            %% a binary it will be seen as the original
  588:                            %% unicode string.
  589:                            io:format("~ts",[list_to_binary(Chars)]),
  590:                            {ok, Chars};
  591:                        Else ->
  592:                            Else
  593:                    end
  594:           end,
  595:           [list],
  596:           "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  597: 
  598:     %% Valid utf8
  599:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"duπa"/utf8>>),
  600: 
  601:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  602:     receive
  603:         {ErlPort, {data, Data}} ->
  604:             %% On stdout any unicode should be translated to hex syntax
  605:             "du\\x{3C0}a" = Data
  606:     end,
  607: 
  608:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  609:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  610: 
  611:     ok.
  612: 
  613: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions) ->
  614:     start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, "").
  615: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, ExtraArgs) ->
  616:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{active, false},{packet,4}]),
  617:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  618:     Cmd = lists:append(
  619:             [ct:get_progname(),
  620:              " -noshell ",
  621:              ExtraArgs,
  622:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  623:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " read_raw_from_stdin ", integer_to_list(Port)]),
  624:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
  625:     ErlPort = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof, stderr_to_stdout,
  626:                                        {env, [{"LC_CTYPE","en_US.UTF-8"}]}]),
  627:     {ok, P} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  628:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(IoOptions)),
  629:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(ReadFun)),
  630:     {ok, P, ErlPort}.
  631: 
  632: read_raw_from_stdin([Port]) ->
  633:     try
  634:         {ok, P} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, list_to_integer(atom_to_list(Port)),
  635:                                   [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
  636:         {ok, OptionsBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  637:         io:setopts(standard_io, binary_to_term(OptionsBin)),
  638:         {ok, ReadFunBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  639:         spawn(fun() ->
  640:                       gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  641:                       init:stop("crash")
  642:               end),
  643:         read_raw_from_stdin(binary_to_term(ReadFunBin), P)
  644:     catch E:R:ST ->
  645:             io:format(standard_error, "~p  ~p",[Port,{E,R,ST}])
  646:     end.
  647: read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P) ->
  648:     case ReadFun() of
  649:         eof ->
  650:             gen_tcp:send(P, "got: eof"),
  651:             init:stop();
  652:         {ok, Char} ->
  653:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  654:                               io_lib:format("got: ~p\n",[Char]))),
  655:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  656:         {ok, Fmt, Char} ->
  657:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  658:                               io_lib:format("got: "++Fmt++"\n",[Char]))),
  659:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  660:         {error, Reason} ->
  661:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  662:                               io_lib:format("error: ~p\n",[Reason]))),
  663:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P)
  664:     end.
  665: 
  666: get_lc_ctype() ->
  667:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  668: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  669: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  670: 	_ ->
  671: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  672:     end.
  673: 
  674: %% Test various unicode options.
  675: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  676:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  677:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  678:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  679:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  680:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  681: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  682: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  683: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  684: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  685:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  686:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  687: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  688: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  689: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  690: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  691: 
  692:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  693:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  694:     %% larger than 127).
  695:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  696:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  697: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  698: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  699: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  700: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  701:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  702: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  703: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  704: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  705: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  706: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  707: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  708:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  709: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  710: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  711:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  712: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  713: 					     [read,binary]),
  714: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  715: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  716: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  717: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  718: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  719: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  720: 			  file:close(F),
  721: 			  R
  722: 		  end,
  723:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  724: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  725: 						 [read,binary,
  726: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  727: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  728: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  729: 			      file:close(F),
  730: 			      R
  731: 		      end,
  732:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  733: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  734: 						     [read,
  735: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  736: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  737: 				  file:close(F),
  738: 				  R
  739: 			  end,
  740:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  741: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  742: 							 [read,
  743: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  744: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  745: 				      file:close(F),
  746: 				      R
  747: 			      end,
  748:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  749:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  750:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  751:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  752:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  753: 
  754:     BomDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMDATA"]),
  755:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  756:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  757:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  758: 
  759:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  760: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  761: 					      [write,binary]),
  762: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  763: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  764: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  765: 			   file:close(F),
  766: 			   ok
  767: 		   end,
  768:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  769:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  770:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  771: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  772: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  773: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  774: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  775: 			       file:close(F),
  776: 			       ok
  777: 		       end,
  778:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  779:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  780:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  781:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  782: 
  783:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  784: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  785: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  786: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  787: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  788: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  789: 					utf8 ->
  790: 					    unicode;
  791: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  792: 					    Tpl;
  793: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  794: 					    {Atom, big}
  795: 				    end,
  796: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  797: 				 file:read(F,10),
  798: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  799: 			     ok
  800: 		     end,
  801:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  802:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  803:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  804: 
  805:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  806:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  807:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  808:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  809: 
  810: 
  811:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  812:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  813: 
  814:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  815: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  816: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  817: 					 [write,binary]),
  818: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  819: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  820: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  821: 			      ok
  822: 		      end,
  823:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  824: 
  825:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  826: 	new ->
  827: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  828: 	    rtnode:run(
  829:               [{putline,""},
  830:                {putline, "2."},
  831:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  832:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  833:                {expect, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  834:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  835:                {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  836:                {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  837:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  838:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  839:                {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  840:               ],[],"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]);
  841:         _ ->
  842:             ok
  843:     end,
  844:     rtnode:run(
  845:       [{putline,""},
  846:        {putline, "2."},
  847:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  848:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  849:        {expect, "[\n ]{encoding,latin1}"},
  850:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  851:        {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  852:        {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  853:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  854:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  855:        {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  856:       ],[],"",
  857:       ["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
  858:     ok.
  859: 
  860: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  861: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  862:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  863:     rand:seed(default),
  864:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  865:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  866:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  867: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  868:     FSize = 9*1024,
  869:     NumItersRead = 2,
  870:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  871:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  872:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  873: 
  874:     DoOneFile1 =
  875: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  876: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  877: 		io:format("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  878: 		io:format(standard_error,
  879: 			  "Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  880: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  881: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  882: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  883: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  884: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  885: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  886: 
  887: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  888: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  889: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  890: 				       Read1),
  891: 
  892: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  893: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  894: 				       [read,binary,
  895: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  896: 				       Read2),
  897: 
  898: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  899: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  900: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  901: 				    Other -> Other end
  902: 			end,
  903: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  904: 				       [read,binary,
  905: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  906: 				       Read3),
  907: 
  908: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  909: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  910: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  911: 				    Other -> Other end
  912: 			end,
  913: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  914: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  915: 				       Read4),
  916: 
  917: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  918: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  919: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  920: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  921: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  922: 
  923: 		file:delete(Fname)
  924: 	end,
  925:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  926: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  927: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
  928: 
  929:     DoOneFile2 =
  930: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
  931: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  932: 		io:format("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  933: 		io:format(standard_error,
  934: 			  "Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  935: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  936: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  937: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  938: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  939: 
  940: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
  941: 				       [write],
  942: 				       Encoding,
  943: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  944: 
  945: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
  946: 				       [write,binary],
  947: 				       Encoding,
  948: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  949: 
  950: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
  951: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
  952: 			       ok
  953: 		       end,
  954: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
  955: 				       [write],
  956: 				       Encoding,
  957: 				       Fun3),
  958: 
  959: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
  960: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
  961: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
  962: 		       end,
  963: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
  964: 				       [write],
  965: 				       Encoding,
  966: 				       Fun4),
  967: 
  968: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
  969: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
  970: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
  971: 			       ok
  972: 		       end,
  973: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
  974: 				       [write],
  975: 				       Encoding,
  976: 				       Fun5),
  977: 
  978: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
  979: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
  980: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
  981: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
  982: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
  983: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
  984: 
  985: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
  986: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
  987: 
  988: 		ok
  989: 	end,
  990:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  991: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  992: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
  993:     ok.
  994: 
  995: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  996:     do(fun() ->
  997: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
  998:        end).
  999: 
 1000: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1001:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
 1002:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
 1003:     ok = file:close(F),
 1004:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
 1005: 
 1006: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
 1007:     case Fun(F) of
 1008: 	eof ->
 1009: 	    [];
 1010: 	{error,Error} ->
 1011: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
 1012: 	    exit(Error);
 1013: 	Other ->
 1014: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
 1015:     end.
 1016: 
 1017: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
 1018:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
 1019:     do(fun() ->
 1020: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
 1021:        end).
 1022: 
 1023: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
 1024:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
 1025:     Writer(F),
 1026:     ok = file:close(F),
 1027:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
 1028:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
 1029:     Bin.
 1030: 
 1031: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1032:     atom_to_list(Atom);
 1033: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
 1034:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
 1035: 
 1036: 
 1037: random_unicode(0) ->
 1038:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
 1039:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
 1040:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
 1041:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
 1042:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
 1043:      case rand:uniform(20) of
 1044:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
 1045:          _ -> []
 1046:      end];
 1047: random_unicode(N) ->
 1048:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
 1049:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
 1050: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
 1051: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
 1052: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
 1053: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
 1054: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
 1055: 	end,
 1056:     if
 1057:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
 1058:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
 1059:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
 1060:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
 1061: 	    random_unicode(N);
 1062: 	true ->
 1063: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
 1064:     end.
 1065: 
 1066: 
 1067: %% Test variants with binary option.
 1068: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1069:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1070:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1071:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1072: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
 1073: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
 1074: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
 1075: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
 1076: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
 1077:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
 1078:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
 1079:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
 1080:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
 1081:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
 1082:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
 1083:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
 1084:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
 1085:     file:close(F),
 1086:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
 1087:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
 1088:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
 1089:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
 1090:     file:position(F2,0),
 1091:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
 1092:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
 1093:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
 1094:     file:close(F2),
 1095:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
 1096:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
 1097:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
 1098:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
 1099:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
 1100:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1101:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1102:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1103:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
 1104:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1105:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1106:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1107:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1108:     file:close(F3),
 1109: 
 1110:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
 1111:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1112: 	new ->
 1113: 	    rtnode:run(
 1114:               [{putline, "2."},
 1115:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1116:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1117:                {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1118:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1119:                {putline, "hej"},
 1120:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1121:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1122:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1123:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1124:                {putline, "hej"},
 1125:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1126:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1127:                {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1128:                {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1129:               ],[]);
 1130:         _ ->
 1131:             ok
 1132:     end,
 1133:     %% And one with oldshell
 1134:     rtnode:run(
 1135:       [{putline, "2."},
 1136:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1137:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1138:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1139:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1140:        {putline, "hej"},
 1141:        {expect, "[\n ]\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1142:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1143:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1144:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1145:        {putline, "hej"},
 1146:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1147:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1148:        {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1149:        {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1150:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
 1151:     ok.
 1152: 
 1153: answering_machine1(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
 1154:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1155:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
 1156:     TestDataLine1Oct = "\\\\345( \b)*\\\\344( \b)*\\\\366",
 1157:     rtnode:run(
 1158:       [{putline,""},
 1159:        {putline, "2."},
 1160:        {expect, "2"},
 1161:        {putline, "io:getopts()."},
 1162:        {expect, ">"},
 1163:        {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
 1164:        {expect, "<"},
 1165:        %% get_line
 1166:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1167:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1168:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1169:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1170:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1171:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1172:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1173:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1174:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1175:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1176:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1177:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1178:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1179:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1180:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1181:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1182:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1183:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1184:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1185:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1186:        %% get_chars
 1187:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1188:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1189:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1190:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1191:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1192:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1193:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1194:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1195:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1196:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1197:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1198:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1199:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1200:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1201:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1202:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1203:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1204:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1205:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1206:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1207:        %% fread
 1208:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1209:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1210:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1211:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1212:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1213:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1214:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1215:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1216:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1217:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1218:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1219:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1220:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1221:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1222:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1223:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1224:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1225:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1226:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1227:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1228: 
 1229:       ],Me,"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1230:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1231:     O ! {self(),done},
 1232:     ok.
 1233: 
 1234: answering_machine2(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->

 1288:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1289:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1290:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1291:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1292:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1293:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1294:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1},
 1295:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1296:        {expect, "Prompt"},

 1299:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1300:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1301:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1302:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1303:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1304:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1305:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1306: 
 1307:       ],Me,"",["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1308:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1309:     O ! {self(),done},
 1310:     ok.

 1312: 
 1313: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1314: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1315:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1316: 	noshell ->
 1317: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1318: 	_ ->
 1319: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
 1320:     end.
 1321: 
 1322: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1323: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1324:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1325: 	noshell ->
 1326: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1327: 	old ->
 1328: 	    {skipped,"No new shell"};
 1329: 	_ ->
 1330: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
 1331:     end.
 1332: 
 1333: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
 1334:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1335:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1336:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1337: 
 1338:     N2List = peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1339:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
 1340:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
 1341:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
 1342: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
 1343: 
 1344:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
 1345:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
 1346:     %% get_line
 1347:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
 1348:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1349:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1350:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1351:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1352:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1353:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1354:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1355:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1356:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1357:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1358: 
 1359:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1360:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1361:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1362:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1363:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1364:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1365: 
 1366:     %%get_chars
 1367:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1368:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1369:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1370:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1371:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1372:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1373:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1374:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1375:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1376:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1377: 
 1378:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1379:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1380:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1381:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1382:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1383:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1384:     %%fread
 1385:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1386:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1387:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1388:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1389:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1390:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1391:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1392:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1393:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1394:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1395:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1396:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1397:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1398:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1399:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1400:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1401: 
 1402: 
 1403:     receive
 1404: 	{AM1,done} ->
 1405: 	    ok
 1406:     after 5000 ->
 1407: 	    exit(timeout)
 1408:     end,
 1409:     ok.
 1410: 
 1411: 
 1412: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
 1413: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1414:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1415:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1416:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1417:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1418:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1419: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1420:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1421:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1422:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1423:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1424:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1425:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1426:     ok.
 1427: 
 1428: 
 1429: %%
 1430: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1431: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1432:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1433:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1434: 
 1435: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1436:     Enc;
 1437: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1438:     latin1;
 1439: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1440:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1441: 
 1442: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1443: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1444:     case {ct:get_progname(),os:type()} of
 1445: 	{Erl,{unix,linux}} ->
 1446: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1447: 	    try
 1448: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1449: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1450: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1451: 			       _ ->
 1452: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1453: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1454: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1455: 				       _ ->
 1456: 					   throw(skip)
 1457: 				   end
 1458: 			   end,
 1459: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1460: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1461: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1462: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1463: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1464: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1465: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1466: 			ok;
 1467: 		    Other1 ->
 1468: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1469: 		end,
 1470: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1471: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1472: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1473: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1474: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1475: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1476: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1477: 			ok;
 1478: 		    Other2 ->
 1479: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1480: 		end
 1481: 	    catch
 1482: 		throw:skip ->
 1483: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1484: 	    end;
 1485: 	{_,_} ->
 1486: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1487:     end.
 1488: 
 1489: raw_stdout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1490:     Cmd = lists:append(
 1491:             [ct:get_progname(),
 1492:              " -noshell -noinput",
 1493:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1494:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " write_raw_to_stdout"]),
 1495:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
 1496:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof]),
 1497:     Expected = lists:seq(0,255),
 1498:     Expected = get_all_port_data(Port, []),
 1499:     Port ! {self(), close},
 1500:     ok.
 1501: 
 1502: get_all_port_data(Port, Acc) ->
 1503:     receive
 1504:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 1505:             get_all_port_data(Port, [Acc|Data]);
 1506:         {Port, eof} ->
 1507:             lists:flatten(Acc)
 1508:     end.
 1509: 
 1510: write_raw_to_stdout() ->
 1511:     try
 1512:         ok = io:setopts(standard_io, [{encoding, latin1}]),
 1513:         ok = file:write(standard_io, lists:seq(0,255)),
 1514:         halt(0)
 1515:     catch
 1516:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 1517:             io:format(standard_error, "~p~p~p", [Class, Reason, StackTrace]),
 1518:             halt(17)
 1519:     end.
 1520: 
 1521: raw_stdout_isatty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1522:     rtnode:run(
 1523:         [{putline,"io:setopts(group_leader(), [{encoding, latin1}])."},
 1524:          {putline,"file:write(group_leader(),[90, 127, 128, 255, 131, 90, 10])."},%
 1525:          {expect, "\\QZ^?\\200\\377\\203Z\\E"}
 1526:         ],[]),
 1527:         ok.
 1528: %%
 1529: %% Test I/O-server
 1530: %%
 1531: 
 1532: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1533:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1534: 
 1535: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1536:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1537: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1538:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1539: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1540:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1541: 
 1542: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1543:     Pid ! Mess,
 1544:     receive
 1545: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1546: 	    Answer
 1547:     after 5000 ->
 1548: 	    exit(timeout)
 1549:     end.
 1550: 
 1551: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1552:     receive
 1553:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1554:             case request(Request,State) of
 1555:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1556:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1557:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1558:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1559:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1560:                     exit(Reply)
 1561:             end;
 1562:         %% Private message
 1563:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1564:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1565:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1566:         {From, getall} ->
 1567:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1568:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1569:         {From, quit} ->
 1570:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1571: 	    ok;
 1572:         _Unknown ->
 1573:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1574:     end.
 1575: 
 1576: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1577:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1578: 
 1579: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1580:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1581: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1582:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1583: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1584: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1585:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1586: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1587:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1588: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1589: 										State#state.q]}};
 1590: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1591:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1592:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1593: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1594: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1595: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1596:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1597: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1598:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1599: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1600:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1601: request(getopts, State) ->
 1602:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1603: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1604: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1605: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1606: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1607:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1608: 
 1609: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1610:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1611: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1612:     Error;
 1613: multi_request([], State) ->
 1614:     State.
 1615: 
 1616: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1617:     Atom;
 1618: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1619:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1620: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1621:     try
 1622: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1623: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1624: 	L
 1625:     catch
 1626: 	_:_ ->
 1627: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1628:     end;
 1629: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1630:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1631: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1632:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1633: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1634: 	    Bin;
 1635: 	_ ->
 1636: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1637:     end.
 1638: 
 1639: atom2list(A) ->
 1640:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1641: 
 1642: chomp([]) ->
 1643:     [];
 1644: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1645:     [];
 1646: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1647:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1648: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1649:     <<>>;
 1650: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1651:     <<>>;
 1652: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1653:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1654:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1655: chomp(Atom) ->
 1656:     Atom.
 1657: 
 1658: do(Fun) ->
 1659:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1660: 				    exit(Fun())
 1661: 			    end),
 1662:     Ref.
 1663: 
 1664: done(Ref) ->
 1665:     receive
 1666: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1667: 	    Result
 1668:     end.
